name: Squat
description: A compound exercise that targets the quadriceps, hamstrings, glutes, and lower back.

name: Bench Press
description: An upper body exercise that primarily targets the chest, triceps, and shoulders.

name: Deadlift
description: A compound exercise that targets the lower back, glutes, hamstrings, and core.

name: Overhead Press
description: An exercise that targets the shoulders, triceps, and upper chest.

name: Barbell Row
description: A compound exercise that targets the upper back, lats, and biceps.
